argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: True (.T.) = there is another result set. False (.F.) = there was an error. NotFound means there was no result set.

argument.name: SQL::ResultSet
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object created with a DIM statement.

page.description: Position to the next set of rows in the ResultSet (applies only when multiple results are returned).
page.discussion: For databases that support returning more than one result set from a single SQL statement (or batch), the SQL::ResultSet.NextResult() method positions to the next SQL::ResultSet. The result set will be reinitialized and be positioned just prior to the first row in the next result set.
